Class ClanChiefMenu

java.lang.Object
characters.ClanChiefMenu
public class ClanChiefMenu extends Object
Menu to manage clan chiefs through a menu interface. Allows users to control multiple clan chiefs and perform various actions such as examining places, creating characters, managing potions, etc.
